2076240.name: Elementals: The Magic Key
2076240.description:
"Elementals: The Magic Key" takes you on a thrilling adventure to help Albert, a young magician, restore the Key of Eiron and save his sister kidnapped by Sibelius, a wicked sorcerer. You'll never feel lonely in your fascinating travels - your aide, Felly, will faithfully follow you, no matter what challenges you face. Solve these brain-teasing puzzles, rummage through cleverly hidden items and try your hand at challenging board battles in this amazing hidden object game.

* Enchanting world of magic inhabited by elementals
* Immersive and gripping storyline
* Over 30 puzzles and mini-games
* Over 20 amazing locations
2076240.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 日语, 波兰语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
